Title: Voyage to Cythera
Writer: Theodoros Angelopoulos (screenplay), Thanassis Valtinos (screenplay), Tonino Guerra (screenplay), Theodoros Angelopoulos (idea), Pierre Baudry (idea)
Actors: Manos Katrakis, Mairi Hronopoulou, Dionysis Papagiannopoulos, Dora Volanaki
Plot: An old communist returns to Greece after 32 years in the Soviet Union. However, things aren't the way he had hoped for.
